Message: A large tree on the Holy Night...

When it comes to trees,
only one person
comes to mind—
The Witch of the Deep Forest,
Master Merlyn!

Oh! There’s Master Merlyn
strolling down
the hall right now!
Luck truly is on my side!

“The Shining Star
of Holy Darkness,
Stella, has arrived!

Come, let us uncover
the ancient covenant hidden
in the shadows of night!”
With Master Merlyn now in tow,

we headed for the next trial
on my truth-seeking sojourn—
the Archive of the Ancients.

But, none of the texts
showed much promise...

So, to increase
our odds of success,
Master Merlyn and I
temporarily parted ways.

And, with her—
The Witch of Prophetic Wisdom,
Miss Loki!

Luck—nay—
the very world itself,
truly is on my side!

Without further ado,
I shall ask those two
for some clues!
